description:
Integration tests for beads-web-monitor application covering server lifecycle, API endpoints, WebSocket functionality, and UI components.

## Testing Framework
- **Test Runner**: Vitest (already configured in vite.config.ts)
- **Browser Testing**: Playwright (for component and page tests)
- **Component Testing**: Follow Svelte testing guide at https://svelte.dev/docs/svelte/testing

## Test Structure

### Server-side Integration Tests
Use Vitest with Node environment to test:
- Server startup/shutdown lifecycle with real daemon connection
- API endpoints with real RPC client communication
- WebSocket connection and mutation broadcasting
- Static file serving and SPA routing

### Component/Page Integration Tests
Use Vitest with Playwright browser environment to test:
- Component rendering and interaction (Navigation, Layout, etc.)
- Page workflows (Overview, Statistics, Issue Detail, Settings, Error pages)
- User interactions (filters, search, epic expansion, navigation)
- Real-time updates via WebSocket

## Configuration
The project already has browser testing configured:
- Client tests: `src/**/*.svelte.{test,spec}.{js,ts}` run in Playwright browser
- Server tests: `src/**/*.{test,spec}.{js,ts}` run in Node

Use `vitest-browser-svelte` for rendering Svelte components in tests as shown in the Svelte testing documentation.

## Running Tests
```bash
bun vitest                # Run all tests
bun vitest --project=client  # Component/page tests only
bun vitest --project=server  # Server integration tests only
```

description: Stats API endpoint was only returning basic counts (total, open, in_progress, closed) but the statistics page also expects by_priority and by_type breakdowns. This caused all type/priority charts to show 0 values.
